opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Ollivierre, AKA Bridges v. United States

opinion:
543 U.S. 1112

OLLIVIERRE, AKA BRIDGES
v.
UNITED STATES.

No. 04-7096.

Supreme Court of United States.

January 24, 2005.

1

C. A. 4th Cir. Reported below: 378 F. 3d 412; Motions of petitioners for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Certiorari granted, judgments vacated, and cases remanded for further consideration in light of United States v. Booker, ante, p. 220.
